评论详情: Used these for party favors ! Makes for cute pictures! Best bang for the buck here.

评论概述: Bachelorette party Fun AND 5 year old bday party fun!
评论详情: I am all about multiple use! These were a great add on for a bachelorette party as well as a 5 year bday party! Can you get more versatile? For the money- buy these for your next party- they are fun, stylish, and a perfect add on for any party 🎉
My daughter and her friends  loved these for her 16th birthday party.  You get Alot for the money and they are well made.
Very cute and comfortable to wear. Using for a work related activity, better than expected!

类型: Color: Mixed HotpinkLens Color: Mixed Color
评论详情: These are super cute to use as party favors, or in a teacher/doctors reward box. There's a variety of shapes, and they fit nicely with the theme of her party. Exactly what I needed, but I wouldn't expect them to be quality sunglasses that will last years.

类型: Color: Mixed HotpinkLens Color: Mixed Color
评论详情: You get at least ten to twelve pairs in the set. I got the mixed set with the black and pink and clear/pink. All the glasses have their own unique shape. Some are hearts, some circles, squares plus some more unique shapes. They are a good size- about the size of your typical pair of sunglasses- maybe a little bigger. The color of both the rims and lenses are fun and so is the shape. They're made pretty well for the value and the variety is good. They come nicely presented in a pink box. Look like they would be good favors I'd also recommend them if you are looking for a nice sized quantity of sunglasses for different moods.
